_sText:
Bored of maps where zombies are continually killed from unreachable spots, this adds a bit of fun to zombie.

All players spawn and run through various doors, some locked, some open until they reach the safe room where they can try and hold off the zombies.

Meant for a bit of a laugh. Inspiration from the tv show.

Made in an hour, so not amazing looking, just meant for scared running from the zombies.

Fits up2 50, but 20 is a good number.
